      • printDirectory

        public static void printDirectory(java.lang.String path)
        Print the directory starting at the specified path to the console. Useful for debugging a unit test that references resources. Code taken from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2056221/recursively-list-files-in-java
        Parameters:
        path - the path where to list the directory contents from

      • isValidMapName

        public static boolean isValidMapName(java.lang.String p_map_name)
        Checks that the p_map_name contains valid characters as defined by the Country and Continent names, i.e. letters, digits, '_', '-' (e.g. no spaces). Must contain at least 1 letter.
        Parameters:
        p_map_name - the name of the map element to check
        Returns:
        true if the name is valid; otherwise false

        Returns:

      • nthIndexOf

        public static int nthIndexOf(java.lang.String p_str,
                             java.lang.String p_substr,
                             int p_occ)
        find the position of the nth occurrence of a substring
        Parameters:
        p_str - the string to check for substrings
        p_substr - the substring to check for
        p_occ - the nth occurrence
        Returns:
        the position (zero-based) of the nth occurrence of the specified substring. -1 if substring doesn't exist.

      • shiftSubstring

        public static java.lang.String shiftSubstring(java.lang.String l_line,
                                              int l_pos,
                                              int l_to_pos,
                                              char l_fill_char)
        Insert spaces at position l_pos to specified l_to_pos, shifting the rest fo the string as needed
        Parameters:
        l_line - the sting to shift
        l_pos - the position to start inserting spaces (zero-based)
        l_to_pos - the ending position of the inserted spaces (zero-based)
        l_fill_char - the fill character to use as the inserted character
        Returns:
        the string shifted as requested

      • farthestReportField

        public static int farthestReportField(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> l_report,
                                      java.lang.String l_fld,
                                      int l_fld_num)
        Figure out the position of the farthest field
        Parameters:
        l_report - the report with the fields
        l_fld - the field identifier
        l_fld_num - the nth field indicated by the identifier position
        Returns:
        the position of the nth field identifier from supplied string array

      • justifyReportyField

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> justifyReportyField(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> l_report,
                                                                        java.lang.String l_fld,
                                                                        int l_fld_num,
                                                                        int l_to_pos,
                                                                        char l_fill_char)
        Justify the fields on the report
        Parameters:
        l_report - the report with the fields justified
        l_fld - the field identifier
        l_fld_num - the nth field indicated by the identifier
        l_to_pos - the position (column) to justify the field to position
        l_fill_char - the fill character to use as the inserted character
        Returns:
        the justified report
